title: Who supplies the most reliable alternator

posts.content:
Reet blokes & blokette's.

My dynamo is struggling on my '59, 1660cc, so I think it is time for an alternator upgrade, but who supplies the most reliable. I don't want a Chinese repro so may be looking at trying to source a Bosch that is recon'd or that I can get overhauled.

Any pointers peeps, cheers, me!
what do you mean by struggling…does it not just need some new bushes etc…i run a dynamo and manages quite well keeping x2 120amp leisure batteries charged
